patient_info: Lens subluxation,Scoliosis,Low back pain,High myopia,Lens luxation
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Marfan syndrome (马方综合征)
2. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome ( Ehlers-Danlos 综合征)
3. Stickler syndrome (施泰克勒综合征)
4. Fuchs' dystrophy (福克斯失明症)
5. Weill-Marchesani syndrome (韦尔-马奇萨尼综合征)
6. Homocystinuria (同型半胱氨酸尿症)
7. Retinitis pigmentosa (视网膜色素变性)
8. Osteogenesis imperfecta (成骨不全症)
9. Myotonic dystrophy (肌张力障碍性肌营养不良)
10.综合征 (Malignant hyperthermia syndrome)
